overview: Bernhard began his career in 1994 in Munich first as a senior investor, then as a partner at Atlas Venture, an american venture capital company specialized in TIC and life science. Then he worked as a partner at Innotech Partners, a venture capital company specialized in new technology and renewable energies. In 2004, Bernhard became a partner in charge of new technologies at DVC (Deutsche Venture Capital) in Munich, one of the biggest venture capital companies in Germany. There he worked in Cyril Bertrandâ€™s team. A German in Munich, Bernhard Schmid joined the XAnge team in 2008, where he manages the operations in the german-speaking countries. Bernhard has a degree from the Munich University (MBA).
